posts.post_content:
Posted By: Zach Rice
I am selling the five T209-2s pictured below (Eldridge, Hooker, Andrada, Clemens and Dobson). All cards would grade poor-fair; the Dobson has an overall ex appearance but has the common paper loss on the card’s upper border and a minor wrinkle that can’t be seen in the scan. This is a small sampling of cards that rarely show; I am asking $400 delivered for the lot. 

Thanks,

Zach Rice
Zacharyrice@sbcglobal.net


[IMG]http://i102.photobucket.com/albums/m84/mzm55cards/T209snet.jpg[/IMG]
